trans-unit.source: Represents a certificate's public key information.
This class cannot be inherited.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.PublicKey> object contains the object identifier (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.PublicKey.Oid%2A>) representing the public key algorithm, the ASN-encoded parameters, and the ASN.1-encoded key value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.PublicKey>物件包含的物件識別碼 (<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.PublicKey.Oid%2A>) 代表公開金鑰演算法、 ASN 編碼的參數及 (ASN.1） 編碼的金鑰值。

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to use the public key from a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2> object to encrypt a file.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範如何使用的公開金鑰<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.X509Certificate2>物件來加密檔案。

trans-unit.source: It also shows how to decrypt the encrypted file using the private key for that certificate.
trans-unit.target: 它也會示範如何使用該憑證的私密金鑰加密的檔案解密。

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會建立命令列可執行檔，會將憑證檔，做為引數，並列印到主控台的各種憑證屬性。

trans-unit.source: An object identifier (OID) object that represents the public key.
An ASN.1-encoded representation of the public key parameters.
An ASN.1-encoded representation of the public key value.

Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.PublicKey" /> class using an object identifier (OID) object of the public key, an ASN.1-encoded representation of the public key parameters, and an ASN.1-encoded representation of the public key value.
Gets the ASN.1-encoded representation of the public key value.
The ASN.1-encoded representation of the public key value.
trans-unit.target: ASN.1 編碼表示法的公開金鑰值。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立命令列可執行檔，會將憑證檔，做為引數，並列印到主控台的各種憑證屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the ASN.1-encoded representation of the public key parameters.
The ASN.1-encoded representation of the public key parameters.
trans-unit.target: ASN.1 編碼表示法的公用金鑰參數。

trans-unit.source: Gets an <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.RSACryptoServiceProvider" /> or <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.DSACryptoServiceProvider" /> object representing the public key.
An <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm" /> object representing the public key.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Security.Cryptography.AsymmetricAlgorithm" />物件，代表的公開金鑰。

trans-unit.source: This property returns the public key.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性傳回的公開金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Both <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA> and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA> keys are supported.
trans-unit.target: 同時<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.RSA>和<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.DSA>支援的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: Call this property to obtain a certificate's public key.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫這個屬性來取得憑證的公開金鑰。

trans-unit.source: Repeated calls to this property will return the same key.
trans-unit.target: 重複的呼叫這個屬性會傳回相同的索引鍵。

trans-unit.source: The following code example opens the current user certificate store, selects only active certificates, and then allows the user to select one or more certificates.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例開啟目前使用者憑證存放區、 選取作用中憑證，並允許使用者選取一個或多個憑證。

trans-unit.source: The example then writes certificate information to the console.
trans-unit.target: 然後此範例會將憑證資訊寫入主控台中。

trans-unit.source: The key algorithm is not supported.
Gets an object identifier (OID) object of the public key.
An object identifier (OID) object of the public key.
trans-unit.target: 物件識別碼 (OID) 的公開金鑰物件。

trans-unit.source: An object identifier (OID) is a number that uniquely identifies an object class or attribute.
trans-unit.target: 物件識別碼 (OID) 是可唯一識別物件類別或屬性的數字。

trans-unit.source: An object identifier is represented as a dotted decimal string, such as "1.2.3.4."
trans-unit.target: 物件識別碼被以點的十進位字串，例如"1.2.3.4"。

trans-unit.source: Object identifiers are organized into a global hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 物件識別碼會組織成通用的階層。

trans-unit.source: National registration authorities issue root object identifiers to individuals or organizations, who manage the hierarchy of OIDs grouped below their root object identifier.
trans-unit.target: 國家註冊授權單位發出根物件識別元給個人或組織，管理 Oid 分組其根物件識別項之下的階層。

trans-unit.source: The following code example creates a command-line executable that takes a certificate file as an argument and prints various certificate properties to the console.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例會建立命令列可執行檔，會將憑證檔，做為引數，並列印到主控台的各種憑證屬性。
